title: Set Up a Retargeting Campaign
description: A media buyer wants to set up a display advertising campaign that retargets all users who have visited the website in the last 30 days.

tasks.description: Create a new audience in the ad platform for 'All Website Visitors (Last 30 Days)'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the retargeting audience based on the tracking pixel.

tasks.description: Create a new campaign targeting this audience.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up a new campaign with the correct audience selected.

tasks.description: Upload ad creatives specifically designed for users who are already familiar with the brand.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses ad copy like 'Still thinking about it?' or 'Come back and see what's new'.
